page.title: 20LOCAL CHARACTERS
page.content:
{LOCAL CHARACTERS-WINESTEAD}
As in every village, Winestead has its "characters", two of whom are brothers in their 60th year, living in a cottage which in 1985 does not have electricity, water, sewerage, no modern amenities and they wash at a pump out in the yard. They both do their own cooking etc. and do not speak to each other. Although living in such conditions, they each always buy new cars, one having a Reliant three wheeler car and the other having a large car, currently being a Vauxhall (part of General Motors, America )
